price: Dies verlesen Wir dir von den Zeichen und den weisen Sprüchen.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ نَتۡلُوهُ عَلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَٱلذِّكۡرِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: dhālika natlūhu ʿalayka mina al-āyāti wal-dhik'ri al-ḥakīmi
